description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. Action-RPG Platformer; gain experience, improve your attributes, collect gems and purchase powers. Your prized possessions have been stolen. Fight through 23 insanely zaptastical areas! 2-4 hours of re-playable fun! Can you get back what is yours?
